title: Calories in 1 Oz Vodka
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 oz vodka, including alcohol content, zero carbs or fats, and quick variations for mixers or proof levels.
assumptions: Standard 80-proof (40% ABV) unflavored vodka; 1 oz = ~30 ml serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, and flavorings. Alcoholic beverages should be consumed responsibly; values exclude mixers.

quick_answer.text: 1 oz of 80-proof vodka provides ~64 kcal, all from alcohol with no carbs, protein, or fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mixed with 4 oz soda water (no added calories)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz of vodka?
Does vodka have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Unflavored vodka has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars; all calories from alcohol.

faqs.q: What about calories in a shot of vodka?
faqs.a: A standard 1.5 oz shot has ~96 kcal; 1 oz is ~64 kcal.

faqs.q: How does proof affect calories in vodka?
faqs.a: Higher proof means more calories per oz; 80-proof is ~64 kcal, 100-proof ~80 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there nutrients besides calories in vodka?
faqs.a: No protein, fat, or significant micronutrients; it's essentially pure alcohol calories.
